author: ianna
body:
* Significant Xerces leaks were detected by @Dr15Jones in response to the following post about failing jobs at T0:
https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/recoDevelopment/1525.html

* Fixed and tested in CMSSW_9_2_X_2017-05-28-2300 environment with step3 of 10024.0_TTbar_13+TTbar_13TeV_TuneCUETP8M1_2017_GenSimFull+DigiFull_2017+RecoFull_2017+ALCAFull_2017+HARVESTFull_2017

Note: Many improvements were introduced in L1Trigger/L1TCommon/src/XmlConfigReader.cc which was declared obsolete in the meanwhile.

@kkotov - FYI, please transfer the changes to a new parser or let me know which one is used
title: Xerces Leaked Memory Clean Up
